title: Drawing, "Textile Design: Amaryllis", 1800–1818
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on white wove paper
inscribed: Lower right, pen and brown ink, LAD 81
dimensions:
Sheet: 16.8 x 22 cm (6 11/16 x 8 5/8 in)
Image: 10.3 x 15.2 cm (4 x 6 in)
creditline: Museum purchase from Friends of the Museum Fund
description: Amaryllis at left, blue sea-urchin figure at right against black background flecked with small grey oval rings.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Textile Design: Amaryllis", 1800–1818.
1800–1818. Brush and gouache, graphite on white wove paper. Museum purchase from Friends of the Museum Fund. 1957-46-43.
